DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Smoldering Myeloma Diagnosis Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date of diagnosis of smoldering myeloma, a plasma cell myeloma lacking clinical manifestations and organ impairment, as an abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Smoldering Myeloma Diagnosis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the diagnosis of smoldering myeloma, a plasma cell myeloma lacking clinical manifestations and organ impairment, as an abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: A plasma cell myeloma lacking clinical manifestations and organ impairment.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Concepts.definition: Multiple myeloma lacking clinical manifestations and organ impairment.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
